thread.section_title: Caliper Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Caliper | caliper.com
thread.title: Chuck Hoover

author: Chuck Hoover
title: Chuck Hoover
text: I moved to Maptitude from Mappoint in 2016. Maptitude is a far better and more flexible product, although it takes a little while to learn. That is where their learning and technical support comes in handy. They have great 'how-to' videos and webinars and they will quickly answer support questions. I've never had a question that wasn't answered by end of day or following AM. I particularly like their territory manager ... its intuitive and accommodates lots of options. I highly recommend.
